title: DEP: Deploy & Polish
description: Phase 5: Production deployment. Dockerfiles, Coolify config, domain setup, data migration from PHP demo, and documentation.

title: Create production Dockerfiles
description: Dockerfile.discovery and Dockerfile.client. Multi-stage builds for small images. Include migrations in discovery image. Health check endpoints.
close_reason: Created Dockerfile.discovery and Dockerfile.client with multi-stage builds, health checks, non-root user, migrations included in discovery image

title: Create production docker-compose
description: docker-compose.prod.yml. Postgres with persistent volume. Both services with env file. Network config. Optional: nginx reverse proxy.
close_reason: Created docker-compose.prod.yml with Postgres, discovery, client services, network config, and .env.prod.example. Added prod-* targets to Makefile.

title: Configure Coolify deployment
description: Coolify project setup. Environment variables. Domain configuration. SSL certificates. Deploy both services. Document the process.
close_reason: Deployed to Coolify: client and discovery as separate Dockerfile apps. Using internal Postgres hostname. Documented deployment process in PROJECT_SPEC.md.

title: Set up first client domain
description: DNS configuration for first client. Point to Coolify. Verify SSL. Test end-to-end.

title: Migrate data from PHP demo
description: Export RFPs from PHP demo (JSON). Create import script in rfp-cli. Import into production discovery.rfps. Verify data integrity.
close_reason: Created export script (scripts/export-php-demo.sh) and import CLI command (rfp-cli discovery import --file). Supports dry-run, deduplication by source_url.

title: Create user documentation
description: Brief user guide: login, browse RFPs, pipeline workflow, scoring explanation. Keep it short, target non-technical users. Could be in-app help or PDF.

title: FND: Foundation
description: Phase 1: Project structure, Go modules, database setup, shared code, and CLI structure. This is the base infrastructure that all other phases build on.

title: Set up Go modules for discovery, client, shared
description: Create go.mod files for each service. discovery/go.mod, client/go.mod, shared/go.mod. Set up workspace or replace directives for local development.

title: Implement shared/config package
description: Environment variable loading from .env. Struct with DatabaseURL, GeminiAPIKey, R2 credentials, SessionSecret, SMTP settings. Use envconfig or similar.

title: Implement shared/db package
description: PostgreSQL connection pool using pgx. Query helpers, transaction support. Connection from config.DatabaseURL.

title: Implement shared/models package
description: Go structs for: RFP, SearchQuery, SearchResult, ResearchStep, Source (discovery). User, Session, RFPTracking, Note, Attachment, ScoringRule (client). Match the DB schema.

title: Create CLI skeleton
description: Set up cli/cmd/rfp-cli with cobra. Subcommands: discovery (stats, inspect, research, retry-failed, recent, export). Basic structure, commands can be stubs initially.

title: DSC: Discovery Service
description: Phase 2: Autonomous search and research pipeline. Gemini integration, URL validation, research agent, deduplication, PDF download, scheduler, and CLI tools.
close_reason: All subtasks complete: Gemini search, URL validation, research agent, deduplication, PDF download, scheduler, and CLI commands implemented

title: Implement Gemini search with grounding
description: discovery/internal/search package. Call Gemini API with Google Search grounding. Execute query templates, parse results. Return SearchResult structs.

title: Implement URL validation
description: discovery/internal/validation package. HEAD request to check URL, follow redirects, detect content type. Identify: rfp_page, portal_listing, login_wall, pdf, other.

title: Implement research agent
description: discovery/internal/research package. Multi-step agent: fetch page, extract details via Gemini structured output, find PDFs, check for login walls. Log each step to research_steps table. Port logic from PHP ResearchAgent.

title: Implement deduplication
description: discovery/internal/dedup package. Fuzzy match against existing RFPs. Key signals: agency + state + due date. Consider title similarity. Port from PHP DeduplicationService.

title: Implement PDF download to R2
description: discovery/internal/pdf and shared/r2 packages. Download PDFs from discovered URLs, upload to R2. Store R2 paths in rfps.pdf_urls.
close_reason: Implemented shared/r2 package (S3-compatible R2 client) and discovery/internal/pdf package (PDF download and R2 upload). All tests pass.

title: Implement scheduler
description: discovery/internal/scheduler package. Cron-like runner for daily searches. Execute all enabled query configs, process results with concurrency limit, skip already-processed URLs.
close_reason: Implemented discovery/internal/scheduler package with: Config (interval, concurrency, delays), Store (DB operations for queries/results), Scheduler (cron-like runner with cycle management, URL dedup, validation phase). Refactored main.go to use the new package.

title: Implement discovery CLI commands
description: Wire up CLI commands: stats, inspect <result-id>, research <url>, retry-failed, recent --days, export --format --since. Connect to actual discovery packages.
close_reason: Implemented all 6 CLI commands: stats, inspect, research, retry-failed, recent, export. Created discovery/cliapi package to expose research agent functionality.

title: Create discovery service main
description: discovery/cmd/discovery/main.go. Load config, connect to DB, start scheduler. HTTP health endpoint optional. Graceful shutdown.

title: CLC: Client App Core
description: Phase 3: Core client web application. Web server, authentication, dashboard, RFP list, RFP detail, and stage management.

title: Set up web server and routing
description: client/cmd/client/main.go. HTTP server with chi or stdlib mux. Load config, connect DB. Serve static files from embedded FS. Graceful shutdown.

title: Implement authentication
description: client/internal/auth package. Password hashing (bcrypt), session management (secure random tokens), middleware for protected routes. Login/logout handlers. 30-day sessions.

title: Implement password reset
description: Token-based password reset flow. Send email via SMTP. Token expires in 1 hour. client/internal/auth/reset.go
close_reason: Implemented token-based password reset with SMTP email

title: Create base templates and layout
description: client/web/templates: base.html with header/nav/footer, Tailwind CSS setup. Navy primary color, clean professional look. Embed in binary.

title: Implement dashboard page
description: GET / route. Stats: new RFPs this week, in pipeline, upcoming deadlines. Action items list. Recent activity. Uses templates.

title: Implement RFP list page
description: GET /rfps route. Filter by: stage, score range, state, category, due date. Sort by: score, due date, posted date, title. Pagination. Quick actions.

title: Implement RFP detail page
description: GET /rfps/:id route. Full RFP info from discovery schema. Client tracking info: score breakdown, stage, assignee. Links to source/PDFs.

title: Implement stage management
description: POST /rfps/:id/stage route. Update stage (new->reviewing->qualified->pursuing->submitted->won/lost/passed). Record who changed and when. client/internal/workflow package.

title: CLF: Client App Features
description: Phase 4: Additional client features. Notes, attachments, scoring system, pipeline/kanban view, user management, and email notifications.
close_reason: All tasks completed: notes, attachments, scoring config UI, pipeline view, user management, email digest

title: Implement notes feature
description: POST /rfps/:id/notes route. Add notes to RFP tracking. Display on detail page with author and timestamp. client/internal/handlers/notes.go
close_reason: Implemented notes display: added Note struct, query in RFPDetail handler joins with users table for author name, template shows notes with author and timestamp

title: Implement attachments feature
description: POST /rfps/:id/attachments route. Upload files to R2. Store metadata in client.attachments. Display download links on detail page. Validate file types/sizes.
close_reason: Implemented attachments: R2 storage integration, upload/download handlers with validation, template UI for uploads and file listing

title: Implement scoring engine
description: client/internal/scoring package. Load rules from client.scoring_rules. Calculate auto_score from RFP data. Store score_reasons JSONB. Apply on first track or manual refresh.
close_reason: Implemented scoring engine with 6 rule types, auto-scoring on first track, and manual refresh endpoint

title: Implement scoring configuration UI
description: GET/POST /admin/scoring routes. View/edit scoring rules. Test against sample RFPs. Show score distribution chart. Admin only.
close_reason: Implemented admin scoring UI: view/edit rules, weight adjustment, JSON config editing, test against sample RFPs, score distribution chart

title: Implement pipeline/kanban view
description: GET /pipeline route. Kanban board with columns per stage. Drag-drop to change stage (JS). Filter by assignee, score. Visual cards with key info.
close_reason: Implemented kanban pipeline view with drag-drop stage changes, filters for user/score, completed stage toggle, visual cards with key info

title: Implement user management
description: GET /admin/users, POST /admin/users/invite, POST /admin/users/:id/deactivate. Invite by email, deactivate users. Admin role required. Activity log.
close_reason: Implemented user management: list users, invite with temp password, deactivate (logout), admin-only access

title: Implement email digest
description: Daily/weekly email with new RFPs matching criteria. client/internal/email package. Use SMTP config. Respect user subscription preferences. Scheduler trigger.
close_reason: Implemented email digest: SMTP service, HTML template, new RFP query, subscription-aware SendDailyDigests ready for scheduler
